pair.title: Add Hikvision Camera
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the required fields.
pair.unauthorized: Error 401: this user is not authorized, please make sure you entered the correct details.
pair.timeout: Timeout error: make sure you have entered the correct IP address and that the Hikvision Camera is online.
pair.unknownerror: Unknown error, are you sure you have entered the correct IP address and Homey is on the same network as the Hikvision Camera? Please check your settings and try again.
pair.intro: Enter the IP address of the Hikvision Camera. In case you have configured a username and password of Hikvision Camera please enter these details as well, otherwise leave them empty.
pair.testing: Hikvision Camera connection test succesfull, you can now connect the Hikvision Camera.
